FuncDef: This command clears port statistics for the specified ports.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the physical port identifier. Values-slot [/mda[/port]] or slot/mda/port [.channel]].
Clears information about the specified shaper name, up to 32 characters.
Clears high water marks within specific standard port class pools using the standard parameters. Values-1 to 6.
Clears high water marks within specific alternative port class pools using the alternative parameters. Values-1 to 6.
